alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 14 at 1:57PM EDT until June 14 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 157 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Blakely, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Blakely around 205 PM EDT. Arlington around 230 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Cuba, Damascus, Early Co A/p, Douglasville, Old Damascus, Rock Hill and Rowena. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
